title: Roasted vegetable couscous and slipcote cheese strudel
description: A vegetarian main that's full of flavour - perfect for dinner parties. Use ready made pastry if you're short on time.
ingredients: olive oil, for roasting, frying, drizzling and oiling a bowl
salt and freshly ground black pepper
handful chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
400g/14oz slipcote cheese (a soft sheep's milk cheese available from delis and large supermarkets)
